#Text= Zuko says : " Do n't underestimate me , Zhao !

column1: #Text=I will capture the Avatar before you !
#Text=" Iroh says : " Prince Zuko , that 's enough .
#Text=" Zhao says : " You ca n't compete with me .
#Text=I have hundreds of war ships under my command and you ?
#Text=You 're just a banished prince .
#Text=No home , no allies .
#Text=Your own father does n't even want you .
#Text=" Zuko says : " You 're wrong !
#Text=Once I deliver the Avatar to my father , he will welcome me home with honor , and restore my rightful place on the throne !
#Text=" Zhao says : " If your father really wanted you home , he would have let you return by now , Avatar or no Avatar .
#Text=But in his eyes you are a failure and a disgrace to the Fire Nation .
#Text=" Zuko says : " That 's not true .
#Text=" Zhao says : " You have the scar to prove it .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Maybe you 'd like one to match !
#Text=" Zhao says : " Is that a challenge ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " An Agni Kai .
#Text=At sunset .
#Text=" Zhao says : " Very well .
#Text=It 's a shame your father wo n't be here to watch me humiliate you .
#Text=I guess your uncle will do .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Prince Zuko , have you forgotten what happened last time you dueled a master ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " I will never forget .
#Text="
